evidence.claim: In The Network utilizes AWS services for hosting and processing healthcare data.
The company ensures HIPAA-compliance in its infrastructure for handling sensitive health information.
Integration with EHRs via FHIR and HL7 standards is part of their offering.
They implement real-time communication through Twilio APIs for better patient engagement.
Use of X12 EDI standards to facilitate healthcare transactions such as claims and status inquiries.

icp.icp_reason: In The Network handles X12 transactions and aligns with API-first healthcare integration.
